Go <S%H1980><s%> ye, <S%H1875>inquire<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> me, and <S%H1157>for<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1157>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H4672>found:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H3341>kindled<s%> against us, <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according unto <S%H3605>all<s%> that which is <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> us.
